name: Stickybear Reading
overview: Stickybear: Reading is an educational title for children ages four to eight, based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. The game features three different reading activities, all accompanied with cartoon animations, music and comical sound effects. Using the Sentence Builder players can create their own sentences from nouns and verbs, which will be read out loud by Stickybear. Each sentence features an animation. In Sarah's Word Book players can click on items which then animate, their names are said and displayed textually. Finally in Word Bop, players use a magical cannon that turns items into words and vice versa. The game features both the English and Spanish language to play in.
